We came here on a recommendation from wallpaper (they usually have great places to go to).   The venue is very nice and quite appealing.  The food is ok (some people may like it but we are picky on food).   However this review is about their  zero rate service.    And I am not exaggerating.    The girl at the bar is so stressed and doesn't even look at us and when she was talking to us to take our order she was talking to 4 other people and interrupted us several times.   I am usually forgiving when it comes to service but not at this place.   Avoid this place and Wallpaper you did bad this time.
